name: hysterically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without being able to control your feelings or behaviour because you are extremely frightened, angry, excited, etc.: She started laughing/crying hysterically. He had become hysterically volatile, laughing one moment and crying the next.
More examplesFewer examples"You can't touch me," she said, almost hysterically.One little boy cried hysterically, refusing to let his mother leave.She leapt at him hysterically, tearing at his face.
